Des_Plaines.Dee Road station:
Dee Road is one of two commuter railroad stations on Metra's Union Pacific/Northwest line in the City of Park Ridge, Illinois. It is officially located at 881 North Dee Road, and lies 15.1 miles (24.3 km) from the Ogilvie Transportation Center in Chicago. In Metra's zone-based fare system, Dee Road is in zone C.
Dee Road Station was rebuilt in 2006 as a replacement for the former Dee Road Station on the opposite side of Dee Road, by the Chicago and North Western Railway in 1967.
